messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis, Chauffer Rodney Robinson, Technician Muhammad, Sergeant McMullen, Detective Morton, Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers, Detective David Trehan, Detective Aucoin, Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, Detective Melvin McCullum, Detective Pratt, Detective Mathews, Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger, Orleans Parish Coroner's Office Investigator Parnell Williams.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted in rolling the decedent over and placing her in a body bag; observed a spent casing.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Assisted Investigator Lewis with handling the decedent's body.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Photographed and collected a spent casing at the crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Advised Detective Morton of a blood trail leading from the interior hallway to North Derbignay Street.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Conducted interviews and reviewed evidence related to a home invasion burglary and homicide.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted gunshot residue tests on eyewitnesses at the Homicide Office.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: His documents officially classified the shooting deaths as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Directed the processing of the crime scene and secured the residence.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Mentioned in the context of manning a unit, presumably in a supervisory role.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Listed as manning a unit.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Listed as manning a unit together.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Listed as manning a unit together.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Mentioned in the context of manning a unit, likely involved in investigative duties.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Mentioned in the context of manning a unit, likely involved in investigative duties.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Mentioned in the context of manning a unit, likely involved in investigative duties.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Mentioned in the context of manning a unit, likely involved in investigative duties.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Handled a crime scene in the 1700 block of Mazant Street.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MathewsOfficer Context: Compiled photographic line-ups of suspects at the Homicide Office.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Performed sketching as part of crime scene processing.Officer Role: Scientific Criminal Investigations Division OfficerOfficer Name: Investigator Parnell WilliamsOfficer Context: Investigator from the Orleans Parish Coroner's Office who handled a scene.Officer Role: Investigator
